content.detailedDescription: I was outside on break from work, looking toward the western sky.  it was a nice evening with some low cloud cover, just beginning to get dark out.  i noticed a dark acorn (best shape i can descibe) shaped object in the distance, moving slowly toward the east (toward myself).  it had a white light on the bottom that seemed to swivel or rotate.  i could not judge the size or altitude, but it was just under the low cloud cover and appeared to be about half the size of the moon from my vantage point and forced perspective. i did not hear any sound. the object moved in a straight path from west to east, and seemed to remain at the same altitude. i watched it until it was overhead (approx. 10 min) and then i decided to go inside my workplace and find another person to see it. when i went back outside, it was no longer visible.
content.summary: Acorn shaped object with light on bottom moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed it was about 11 something at night i had just shut off the tv was watching cake boss. went to turn on the bed facing the window the blinds and window were shut i saw this bright red light and i got up and peeked into the blinds and saw something flying very low over my house into the yard behind me near the trees it was dark and we have big trees near me we also live near woods. i saw this object that looked like a airplane or something because it was dark i could not tell if it had wings. i do know that it had bright red lights on the bottom of whatever it was it was. it was flying very slow but not that slow. i was stunned and was in shock to move and find my camera phone to take a picture. i ran upstairs to see if i could see if the thing was still there but it was gone. my brother was up and didnt see anything or hear anything out of the ordinary. i came back to the window and was to afraid to peak but then like a minute later i saw the bright light again. but it was coming back towards my house. i figured if it was a plane it wouldn't come back over my house as the original direction it was going was towards the nearest airport about 40 minutes away i looked like it had a plane like shape but beacuse it was dark i couldnt get a clear picture i only saw these bright red lights everywhere on it.
content.summary: Was sleeping saw a bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in our yard which is lighted, saw a light & looked up to see two large circles of bright light over my tree line, one seemed to jump the other--did this about three times then disappeared as if a light had been turned off.
content.summary: Two large circles of bright light

content.detailedDescription:
==================================

***i do not want to call these "ufo's" because i am not even sure if they were "flying objects"  it seemed to me more like "orbiting objects"***

==================================

before i begin with the report,  i have answered the questions to my right (as i write this post) first:

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
apple valley, ca
sitting in my car smoking a cig.

2. what made you first notice the object?
it flared up and was moving.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
something orbiting the earth.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
only noticed these objects as they flared up into a bright ball, and i watched as it dimmed down moving from north to south (and south to north for the last object)

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
confused

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
the light source dimmed as it moved towards the poles (first two objects heading south, last heading north)

==================================

the report:

around 9:30pm pacific time (west coast united states) i was sitting in my car smoking a cigarette looking through my opened sunroof just gazing at the stars.   then out of nowhere, a star like object appears directly in front of my field of view.  this object was moving from north to south, and as it moved the light from it became more and more faint until i could no longer see it.

a couple of minutes later at the most, i saw a second object, this one flared up really bright, easily the brightest thing in the night sky at the time, i watched it as it moved on the exact same path as the previous object, and it too dimmed until i could no longer see it.

the weird thing about these two objects is, they both did not become visible until their light source/reflection flared up.  and this location is about halfway in the sky from left to right.

after i had my nicotine fill and about 30 minutes later (give or take 15, i was not really keeping track of time) i was standing in our back yard and i saw the third object flare up (just like the previous object), the only difference with this object is, it was not going north to south,  it was going south to north in a perfect strait line.

i have provided a simple mock-up of my field of view and about where these objects originated in the sky, and the path they traveled.  in this mock-up image,  there are 4 brighter stars, they kinda make a diamond shape, i am not an astronomer so i do not know what region of the sky this is or what its called, hopefully somebody will be willing fill me in on this.   in that image,  the bright line that seems to get smaller as it goes to the right is the path the first two objects took,  the third object was moving in the opposite direction, but still originated from that same point,  just outside of that point of the diamond.

i feel like i am leaving much of the information needed out, so if i am able to edit this post (my first post here) i will do so if needed.
content.summary: Bright flares dim as they move in a strait line from north to south / south to north

content.detailedDescription: Sitting with a friend we looked up in the sky and noticed a neon green triangle tail with a orange circle head zoom across the sky from south to north. it left a dim trail of green but disappeared into the sky.
content.summary: Neon green triangle tail, orange head

content.detailedDescription: We were driving east bound on m-25. my son first spotted a bright orange light hovering over lake huron 3x the size of a star from a distance. it appeared to be at a stand still at that moment. when i saw it, i knew it was nothing i have ever seen before. we quick, drove down a side street to the beach to get a closer look. i drove to a road next to the beach and hopped out of the van to find it. i spotted it now just past the lake,hovering over land now,just above us. it was at a stand still for a moment then started to move strangly in slanting way in the sky upward at at a steady speed and it disappeared into the clouds going south west. it happend at about 10:00 pm near lexington heights michigan on june 25th 2011. we were very excited and scared at the same time. i knew this could be a once in a life time experience. we felt lucky cause, we knew what we just saw. something that sure is not from here. the picture i took did not show up or i would have proof.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange light hovering and moving strange

content.detailedDescription: I was in the basement at home and the door was opened to outside.  i saw a disc type ufo in the back yard and a pink and a yellow alien.  then a green alien, the roswell type, came inside the basement and walked over to me and touched my arm.  i had a lot of pain and blacked out for a minute.  when i came to the alien was gone and so was the spaceship.
content.summary: I saw a silver ufo in my back yard and a green alien like the roswell kind came in and touched my arm.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing on our back patio at 11:30pm est when i noticed to the west a single light, slowly heading towards us approximately 2 miles away.  after watching it approach our direction for a couple of minutes; i asked my husband if he noticed any flashing lights coming from it and he confirmed he saw no flashing lights either.  there also was no sound coming from the object.  we both watched it for another couple of minutes until it was just north of our location.  it appeared to be about 500-1000' above the ground.  the light then quickly shot up and ascended in the sky until it disappeared.
content.summary: Single, solid white circular light moving from west to east and then ascended quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on the outside deck and noticed four lights in a square or rectangular pattern.  the lights hovered for several seconds and then they disappeared one by one.  this happened several times for approximately one hour.  

i was speaking to a friend facing the house as he was talking to me facing the ocean, and he noticed the lights.  i turned around to see three of the lights as one had all ready faded away.  my friend saw all four on the first sighting.

we thought it may actually be a ufo.  my friend is an airline pilot and former f-16 pilot and i have some book knowledge of the ufo enigma.  i was also a member of mufon for several years.  

the second time the object appeared the lights were in line parallel to the ground and appeared to have been rotating counterclockwise looking at it from the ground.  we believe it was about 3-5 miles out from the beach, but that is very hard to judge.  the object was about two inches square from where we were looking.  it also appeared to be around three inches off the water.

we were very curious about the event so i decided to post it on your site.  we were wondering if anybody else has posted anything about it?
content.summary: There were four lights that were white and orange/red.  they were holding over the water at holden beach, nc.

content.detailedDescription:
L'otto luglio del 2010 verso le 21:10 stavo salendo le scale esterne di un appartamento di un mio amico situato in lecce (puglia-italia), quando ho visto una sfera luminosa nel cielo, non molto alta dal suolo, e questa sfera era strana perch��� sembrava girasse velocemente su se stessa e cambiasse colori rapidamente. l'impressione che ho avuto ��� che non era qualcosa di normale e mi sentivo molto eccitato, anche perch��� non ��� la prima volta che mi succede di vedere qualcosa di anomalo nel cielo. comunque la sfera nel cielo ��� durata solo alcuni minuti e poi l'oggetto ��� svanito senza lasciare alcuna traccia.

translation:

the 8 july 2010 at about 21:10 i was climbing the outside stairs of an apartment of a friend of mine located in lecce (puglia-italy), when i saw a ball of light in the sky, not very high from the ground, and this sphere was because it seemed strange was running quickly on itself and change colors quickly. the impression i had is that something was not normal and i felt very excited, also because it is not the first time that i happen to see something unusual in the sky. however the ball in the sky only lasted a few minutes and then the object has vanished without a trace
content.summary: È apparsa una sfera luminosa che cambiava colore velocemente e dopo poco tempo è scomparsa

content.detailedDescription: Im in bed, and hear a loud roar. i look out a window and see a large and or very low aircraft with 4 or 5 lights. they were a single aircraft from what i saw. it was a triangle (3 lights)  with a (possibly 2) strobing slowly in the middle. it was heading west directly over i465 at 10th street in warren township. this event actually repeated itself 4 or 5 more times starting around 11 pm on the 27th until about 2 am on the 28th, heading west every time.
content.summary: Flew over the house 5-7 times, large triangle 5 or 4 lights

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were sitting outside at night on the deck talking and looking at the sky. we noticed a dim yellow-orange light that was coming out from behind the treeline by the railroad tracks in back of my house. it was gaining altitude slowly but sunk back behind the trees. you could still see the light shining through them and it had gotten brighter than when we had first saw it. 
as time passed it got even brighter and appeared to be a white light. it stayed in one spot for a while (about a minute and a half). at this point we ruled out the possibility of it being an airplane. i told my friend to go inside and get her digital camera before it went away, so she ran inside. i stayed out on the deck to watch it closely because i felt that it might be gone before she could get outside. the whole time i'm yelling for her to hurry up and get outside because it had started to get dimmer. 
the object would sometimes appear to vanish because the lights would dim to the point where it was not visible. but it would become bright once again right after, almost like it was pulsating slowly.
she came back with the camera, but the object would not show up on the camera when she took pictures of it (probably because it was too dark outside).
after a while of the object being stationary, it started to move slowly to the right where it would pause for a breif period of time before moving slowly to the left. it appeared to be very low in the sky, almost as if it were landing.
it came back above the treeline (still bright white) then dimmed and turned red-orange. it climbed higher into the sky (but still not too far above the trees) and appeared to be two flashing red lights (similar to a plane, but only red lights.) it slowly moved from the south west to the west. there was a blue flash and then a few seconds later it was gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light came from behind treeline.

content.detailedDescription:
I have two ducks and a dog, the last couple of days at around 10 i let them outside and walk around the front yard for atleast 30 minutes, this is when i see these orbs. first night this started happening was on 6/24/2011 10:20 p.M. let my ducks and dog walk around the front yard after 10 mins i look up and forwards and through a tree there was a light blue orb like a star went in a circle and started coming my way, it wasnt close didnt look like it was in the atmosphere. so i run inside and yell at my dad to come look when we get back outside its not there so we sit there looking for a min or 2 and i see it again but this time its right over us, my dad sees it also we watch it for a few seconds heading towards houston until it dissapears.Then the next time i saw this orb was two days later 6/26/2011, i look up and its right there directly above me again but this time heading east watch it for 20 seconds until it vanishes . and tonight 6/27/2011 10:27, 10:35, 10:47 saw it above me but not directly above me moving east again and turn north moving pretty fast and it vanishes saw it the second in front of me moving east agin and go north as if it was going in circles in a 40 mile radius or more and the third time this time right above me again going east, and that was it. also as a child had a strange experience when i was around 8. woke up on my back couldnt move, it was hard to breathe, the only thing that could move were my eyes and i look up and at the end of my bed was a tall dark figure , i was scared to death, thought maybe it was a bad dream, but never had anything like that ever happen in a dream it was so real undescribable, after that incident had a terrible ear infection for two weeks and saw it again in my room. both times when i was able to move again i ran to my parentas screaming sweating and crying, i remember it to this day saying i dont understand what happened i dont know i dont know,i didnt want to go back to sleep for the longest. it has been stuck in my head ever since.  i would like maybe if someone could contact me maybe come with a camera and get these orbs recorded this has got to be the real deal. thank you
                                              daniel
content.summary: Walk outside star gazing seen orb in the sky for the last 3 days around same time but this time saw it three times

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in sydney, nova scotia, canada around the very early hours of june 28. i saw this exact same event happen three times in about 2 hours. i was star gazing as i often do. (aside - i noticed for the first time tonight that one of the stars in the handle of the big dipper is actually two stars that are very close to each other. cool stuff) anyway, i saw a ball of white light similar to a star appear and move at something similar to aircraft speed, but over 5 or 10 seconds the light slowly faded out until i couldnt see it anymore.  i never actually was staring exactly where it appeared, but it was the motion out of nowhere that caught my eye. i have no idea what it could have been, but i am sure that it was not a star or a planet, because it was moving. it was not like any aircraft i have seen before because it did not have flashing lights(was steady light) and did not appear to make any sound. i do not think it was a sateillite because it was much brighter than any sateillite that i have seen before, and the light faded out slowly and unexpectantly. it travelled in a straight line, but faded out as if it was travelling further away. it happened high in the sky so it is not as if it faded as it headed towards the horizon. the first one i saw was travelling mainly south to north. the second one i saw was only about 60 seconds after the first, and this one was travelling mainly north to south. i came inside to tell my friend about what i saw, and a short while later i went back outside and after about 20 minutes i saw another one do the exact same thing, although this one was much further east in the sky, and was travelling mainly north to south.

i was not scared, maybe just a little bit excited at what it could have been. i will be looking for more of these in the future!
content.summary: Star like object moves quickly and fades out over 5-10 seconds. saw 3 in ~1 hour.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i just returned home.  she sat down to smoke a cigarette before going inside and i took to checking out the stars.  when i turned my attention to the big dipper in the northwest, i noticed a bright yellow flowing orb underneath and moving upwards toward the constellation.  almost as soon as i spotted it, it picked up momentum and seemed to decrease in luminosity by about a third.  the color changed from a deep yellow to more of a white.  i called my wife to come quickly, even though she hurt her foot yesterday.  she quickly hobbled over and spotted it with me.  

as we watched, the object zipped through the cup of the big dipper and seemed to be heading out of the atmosphere.  it continued on until it completely faded from view.  i immediately came inside and started this report.  

over the course of the sighting, the object fluctuated in acceleration, brightness, color and direction.  i've attached a graphic to better communicate what i perceived.
content.summary: Fireball appeared to shoot up through the big dipper and into space

content.detailedDescription:
My name is andrew, i live in west warwick rhode island, tonight i was standing out in my back yard with a few friends, when i looked up into the clear night sky i saw a bright light, i thought it was a plane with a really bright spot light, but it seemed too high to be that bright and was too big of an orb to be a spot light, the light was oval in shape and the light was so bright you could see an aura around the light, it was pure white light not even the slightest of a yellow color, it was the whitest light i have ever seen coming from a plane, if that's what it was.

the light moved forward for about 10 seconds and then seemed to ascend upward as it did the light began to dim slowly until we couldn't see it anymore.

my only explanation i can think of, is that if it was a spot light, they turned it off and as the light cooled it dimmed slowly making it appear the light was leaving the atmosphere, because the object was then "shrinking" from sight. but why would they turn the spot light on in the first place if they were going to turn it off anyway. there were no clouds its a clear night, no need for lights besides the marker lights which this had none.

this object was oval in shape it was not blinking whatsoever it was the brightest, vibrant white ive ever seen coming from a flying object. there were no red or blue lights or even white lights blinking. 

just a bright oval shape that seemed to ascend and vanish, if they turned a spot light off, i would then be able to see the red and or blue signal lights, this did not have those whatsoever.

i'm just wondering if anyone else has seen this.
content.summary: Bright orb leaving atmosphere quickly

content.detailedDescription: While sitting at the beach at night, we witnessed three red orange lights in a triangle formation above the ocean. they made no noise and hovered. after a few seconds, they disappeared. it was over the atlantic ocean and appeared to be nothing manmade.
content.summary: Three red orange lights in triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at home to my high rise apartment in southern central valley, koreatown, los angeles at around 11:15 pm june, 26th 2011. i sat down at my northern facing window, which has a panoramic view of the central valley, hollywood sign, los feliz, griffith park and observatory... in short, i can pretty much everything see from west hollywood to the eastern san gabriel valley very clearly before the hills the observatory sits on. no smog coverage ever obstructs my view, and i pride myself on my 20/20 vision, as well as my sane, rational, and moderately skeptical perspective of the world. i am a double ba holder, an engineer, and a non drug using, fully functioning member of society. 

that being said, what i am about to describe defies everything i have come to comprehend about modern science, the boundaries of what is possible in accordance with the laws of physics, and the limits of human understanding, ingenuity, and engineering.

i lit up a cigarette and looked out north towards the valley, and noticed a large light-greyish, possibly even dark white, rectangular object, the size of a small building, that seemed to be floating over the silverlake/eastern hollywood area at what seemed to be an altitude of roughly half mile above the street, possibly even less than that. at first it behaved a lot like a used car-lot sales balloon would, as if it was tethered to the ground, and was being gently rocked back and forth by the wind. it hovered stationary, silently, and seemed to be making very small east/west movements, like back and forth by a few feet. almost as if it was keeping itself up, but for the most part remained stationary over the city; very small movements. at this point i screamed for my girlfriend to come and verify what i was seeing and also get some assurance of my own sanity had not slipped. she too saw exactly what i was seeing.

at first she couldn't speak, but then reasoned that it must be an asteroid entering the atmosphere, as she had read about one travelling in record proximity to earth in recent days. the we quickly realized this was not possible due to the fact that the object began to transform in mid air.

at around 11:33, three minutes after she came to see it, it appeared to come closer to our location by a cupe hundred feet. i was able to make out a clearer shape of what to me looked like someone seated with a jetpack or something square strapped to it's back for a moment, but it was tough to make out still due to the fact that i could not see any self illumination on the object. my girlfriend disagrees and is convinced she saw small blue and white lights on the craft. then it began to split down the middle and change shape. 

11:37, at first it appeared to split down the middle into a v-shape, then more of an l shape with the vertex of the angle pointing towards the ground, then to the western horizon. the rays of the angle were vertical, about 45 degrees to start with both facing the sky, then at 90 degrees, the tilt of one ray shot straight up and the other pointed due east. it then flattened out into what i thought was more of a pyramid shape than the previous rectangular building shape and began to move north, away from us and over the observatory. it then disappeared into the fog and clouds directly over griffith observatory. it must have covered 15 to 20 miles in about that many seconds...

around three minutes later two craft, which i believed to be choppers, but in hindsight i realized were more likely jets due to the speed and color of the lights on the craft (white and green as opposed to lapd choppers, blue and red), appeared at the farthest extent of my view coming from both eastern and western origins towards the area the craft disappeared into. the jets crossed paths with what seemed to be about a mile between them on a north/south axis and continued along their trajectories one towards the pacific, the other inland over the san gabriel valley.

this whole thing lasted about fifteen minutes. end time of 11:48. not a sound was heard the entire time.

i work at night and am very aware of how fast time passes once the sun goes down. my girlfriend pointed out to me at 1am that it had seemed as if hours had passed during the time of our initial report to mufon at 11:55 to the 1:30 am we were now experiencing.

the emotions experienced during the sighting ranged from bewilderment, to utter terror at the ominous presence seen over the city.  i am just stunned at the lack of reports and visual accounts of an object so large being
content.summary: Large pyramid rectangular shape changing object over central valley los angeles

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog with my 3 year old son in the local park in whitefield manchester, it was a very clear warm sunny evening with a few white clouds and blue sky, after playing football with my son we sat down on the grass and took some photos of my son & me with my mobile phone a blackberry,then i took two shots of the sky and clouds about 10-25 seconds apart. i hadnt noticed anything in the sky at the time as i was looking at my phone whilst taking the shot and i heard no sound but looking at the pictures on my phone the next day i noticed a strange object and upon zooming in on the pic i noticed the strange cloud formation like a triangle and an arrow shape. zooming in on the tail section of the arrow shape cloud i noticed a very clear face.

this is a genuine picture taken on my cell phone and i cannot explain it
hope you can.
content.summary: Ufo & very strange cloud formation

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were sky-watching at the end of a birthday party. unfortunately, the sky was somewhat overcast; it remained too light to see many stars, and we never did see the moon. as we were wrapping up and putting chairs away, a bright light suddenly caught my eye. i turned around, anxious to see what i believed was the moon finally making an appearance. but to my great surprise, i saw a small white light ��� very bright, flying across the sky, and it was encircled by very large cream-colored glow. note that there were no clouds specifically; the sky just seemed rather gray. i was surprised that the glow was so large, circular, and bright, yet assumed it was somehow an airplane behind a fog or clouds. still, since our sky-watch had been uneventful, i pointed up and tried to get everyone���s attention. however, i found myself fumbling my words, because, as i spoke, the glow didn���t fade in and out of any clouds as i would have expected, rather it began to shrink evenly around the center light until it was no longer there. what���s more, as the rest of my family looked up, the glowing vanished, and we all witnessed the object suddenly come to a halt. we were thoroughly bemused and unsure as to what we���d actually just seen. had the object vanished and we were now looking at a star���or was the flying object still there and truly standing still? nothing unorthodox happened after that point. as to the size of the object, to cover it if i held something at arm's length, i would have to use a pencil eraser to cover the center light, and a quarter to cover the entire glow. also, the glow was a perfectly shaped circle, not irregular or faded in any way. i have no photos.
content.summary: Bright white light encircled by very large cream-colored glow.

content.detailedDescription: I stood outside for atleast 45 min called my girlfriend to come out and search the skies with meand about 15 min latr we saw a strobing diamon shaped object. and a propeller aircraft. the aircraft as coming from the south west while th trobing diamond came from the east. heading west eventualy the diamond shaped object crosed paths with the private aircraft it had to have passed within feet of the aircraft the plane stayed its course while the stobing diamond shaped object chaned couse and headed back from the direction it came south east. about 15 20 min later an object with no regulation faa lighting was sighted coming from the west behind the house girlfriend notedit was wobbeling and at a verry low altitude for an aircraft in this area observed through binoculars it was indeed wobbleling. and as it continued it would become dimmer untill it passed directly overhead and was completely opaque object was still vissiable thbough binoclars and appeared to have a disk or oval shap from my knowlege it must have been only 10 feet in diamiter the fist object was much smaler but also much brighter and stayedd lit the entire time while the second object maintaned a glow but eventualy fadded  as i saw bolth objects i felt awe. as if i wernt alone even though i don't know if they were terrestrial or extra terrestrial
content.summary: Went outsie to veiw stars and meteors

content.detailedDescription:
My boys and i were standing outside infront of our house around 10pm,to 11pm when we notice a star like object around the powerplant called the killing station that sets on the ohio river around mile post 15 on state rt 52, we could see  the object for about one or two minutes then it faded away or went behind a cloud that we couldnt see, whats weird is that i asked my boys what they saw and the oldest one said it was red the youngest said it was yellow and what i saw was a bright white, it didnt flash to me or the boys.  we have live here for about 13 years, we see planes and jets like that all the time, and this was different. it was moving south to west,following the river but on the kentucky side maybe over a mile distance from us or more, size cant say for sure.
 the next night i seen the light one more time, it came on out of know where then went back off kinda fade off for about two or three seconds i knock on the house for the boys to come out but it was gone and never came back that we could see, thanks for your time.
content.summary: Bright light around the killing station for the last two nights

content.detailedDescription:
I went to see my mom, she has a pla e at lake ufaula. her cabin is s.All



i have pics and good video
content.summary: At moms  cabin at the lake, i woke up to use restroom, saw ufo approach. iwatched for several  hours.

content.detailedDescription:
khoang thang 5 nam 2000 buoi toi khoang 7 gio 48 phut hai ufo xuat hien tren bau troi,toi thay hai ngoi sao tuoi sang hon binh thuong cung mau sac neon dung im lang thu nhat o huong tay va thu hai chech huong dong bac phia tren cao.Ho da tin hieu toi ra ngoai troi nhin ho,neu toi noi voi ai do luc do ho se thay su khac biet nay,nhung toi khong muon co su noi loan,bi su chu y khong can thiet.Toi quan sat nghe thu cong nay du lich toi day no im lang khong am thanh no o tren rat cao.Dieu dac biet ufo da goi them mot "dong minh" cung xuat hien giao tiep voi toi.Kha nang toi du doan 2 ngoi sao khoang cach co the  hon 100 km anh den no tuoi sang,khong the phat hien su khac biet neu khong "y thuc",va no co the xuat hien o nhieu noi.Radar khong the biet duoc,ho khong the vi ly do nao do ma roi xuong dat duoc.[1] luc do toi o trong nha voi bua com toi,thi co cam nhan phia khong gian tren su ky la tuyet voi nay rat vui,phia tran toi co su xuc tram mot dong nang luong la anh sang mo cua 1 et tin hieu ve su hien dien cua ho,di ra ngoai va thay "dong minh" ufo anh sang toi di va sang len khi toi nhin len,mot cach cham(khong nhap nhay nhu den may bay)toi khong noi chuyen,o ben ngoai khoang 20 phut di vao trong nha.[2] buoi toi hom sau ufo xuat hien vao dung gio hom truoc,tin hieu voi toi nhu truoc,hai ngoi sao nhu duoc mot tau me sinh ra anh sang nhu nhau,20 phut sau toi khong hieu ho toi vao nha.[3] hom sau no xuat hien,toi nhan duoc tin hieu manh hon tu et toi di ra ngoai va nhin bau troi hom do trong sang rat nhieu sao khong co mat trang,hai ngoi sao o vi tri nhu hom truoc rat tuoi sang cung sac neon,toi nhin len huong 11 gio ngoi sao huong tay anh sang no tat di va cham rai sang len va toi di co nghia la su dong cam hay la ok,no tat di khoang 30 giay sang len la khong va content.detailedDescription: Time was closer to midnight sat/sun am; as i drove home (night watchman/security) i noticed a giant birdlike ufo. object was weird, and glided over the area at tree-top level w/out a sound.  the craft travlled about 15mph tops. no known reason to appear.  as it flew over a nieghbr's house - it occured the object may have an appendage - but the center was such that it's center was 6ft and it's distance above a cattle farm.  eventually lost sight of the craft after 30 secs or so. this is thired ufo sighting since childhood. felt excited during the vision. also, i'm a paranormal group investigator.
content.summary: Had just finished shift as night watchman - saw a

content.detailedDescription:
06/26/2011 11:30pm crystal clear night near buffalo, ny.  so clear i was able to see a satellite moving across the night sky for the first time in a long time.  while taking a walk i turned the corner and i saw what i thought was an extremely bright jupiter.  my next thought was it was too big and bright to be jupiter, and i was right because it was moving pretty fast in a straight line towards the southwest.  no twinkle or pulsation to the light.  after watching it for a little over a minute it slowly dimmed out like a hid lightbulb.  no noise, no clouds.  this was my first sighting.  i was pretty excited, ever try running down the street while looking up at the sky?  lol, unfortunately it didn't last long.  i wish someone was around me to share the view :/

there's a youtube video from a similar time and location.  the object looks quite similar to what i saw.  i can't compare the object's movement in the video though due to the shaky camara.

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Bright white light

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were camping and we were looking up at the stars and we saw a satelite and we thought that was pretty cool so we kept looking and we saw this white ball of light brighter than all the other stars and it was moving vary fast south/ south east it was dipping in and out so it obviously wasn't a plane and the height it was at it could'nt possibly be a helicopter and then it started to move up and south and it dissapeared for about 2 seconds and then shot back into our atmosphere and was gone i feel crazy but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Ball of white light seen

content.detailedDescription: I saw 2 bright yellow white rod shaped objects that looked like the capital letter i. they were below broken up cloud cover coming from the west. i estmate the length @ about 1 inch. i thought they were planes that were going to crash because 1 was stationary & the second was head straight toward it. when the second got very close the first moved slightly east and vanished then the second did the same. at the exact same i saw another object just like the first 2 approaching from the west at a higher rate of speed and it disappeared where the other 2 had gone. a few seconds later another one came from the west and even faster vanished. i was in my backyard. i have lived here27 years @ go outside often @ night to take my dog outside. i was awe struck, couldn't believe what i'd seen, called my friends, the sheriff's dept, emailed the local news snd now you. i am fristrated and want to know what i saw was real. was it an explainable phenomenon? i don't care if anyone believes me because i know what i saw. please let me know what you think.
content.summary: 4 rod shaped bright objects at differing distances but following same flight path

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to work one early morning. i noticed an object flying in the sky at the same pace and in the same direction as i was going. i thought it was a plane at first on fire. i was in shock as i was driving. it followed me for a few miles then took a sharp right and then nose dive down and then vanished. i ask coworkers if they saw anything they said no. i then watched the news next morning i did not hear anything. i called the police to asked if a plane crashed they said they did not know of one. i know i saw what i saw and have told my husband and one other person what i saw. they make fun of me and say no such thing. i say i saw it and it happend. i always wondered if it did go down into the lake and would think they are hideing down there and then laugh. until i saw on the history channel that they were seeing ufo's in the water. just thought it was time to tell someone like mufon what happened and see if anyone elese might of seen the same. i'm not sure of the date or year i do know it was in the early 90's 91,92, or 93. 

thank you
content.summary: Cigar shaped fire coming out the end of it following on freeway took a sharp right and nose dived down and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
The nite that made me a believer!


     on january 21,2011 at the time of 18:24:50, my wife and i was laying on our bed and watching a movie. there had a very bright light on my front yard that i noticed on my tv monitor which i used for my security cameras.I did not know what i was looking at because i have never seen nothing like this. it was so amazeing to have this happened to me, i have never seen a light so bright in my life. this light was round in shape, the light was changing in shape to a star like figure. than i noticed an image that looked like a person below the light with some type of craft under this person. than all of the sudden the craft flew right towards my camera and was gone. 
      i also have a perfect round white circle flying across my backyard recorded.  please contact me for the video, you have to have security software in order to open!
content.summary: Star-like  shaped very bright light and image of a person standing below the light after that it flew away towards my security camera.I also have a perfect round circle that was flying across my backyard recorded
